DOC.brief_summary: Any adult patient age18 , schedule routine CTA chest chest , abdomen pelvis meet inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion include study . The patient administer low dose intravenous contrast base study examination .
DOC.detailed_description: Any adult patient age18 , schedule routine CTA chest chest , abdomen pelvis meet inclusion criterion meet exclusion criterion include study . The patient administer low dose intravenous contrast base study examination describe . CTA chest : 40 mL intravenous contrast rate 5mL/sec . A region interest ( ROI ) trigger scan place aortic arch . If scan perform use high pitch helical mode , scan delay increase 2 second . CTA chest abdomen CTA chest , abdomen pelvis : 50 mL intravenous contrast rate 5mL/sec . A region interest ( ROI ) trigger scan place aortic arch . If scan perform use high pitch helical mode , scan delay increase 2 second . Following examination , primary investigator ( PI ) team member evaluate image obtain low contrast dose patient 's prior CTA examination perform routine contrast dose . This do quantitative qualitative measure . For quantitative portion , PI team member place region interest predetermine arterial location obtain measure degree opacification . For qualitative measurement , image present blind fashion two thoracic train board certify radiologist board certify interventional radiologist determine quality image base Likert numerical scale . Qualitative quantitative data image obtain low contrast dose prior CTA examination perform routine contrast dose compare . This data along detail scan protocol ( dose , dose rate , scan parameter etc . ) demographic data ( sex , age BMI time examination ) record .
DOC.criteria: Any adult patient schedule compute tomographic arteriogram ( CTA ) chest chest , abdomen pelvis undergone prior CTA perform standard contrast dose ( 100 mL ) institution include study The followup scan routine standard care , emergency image patient approach research Patients prior CTA image comparison Any pediatric patient ( age < 18 ) BMI > 40 Inability follow instruction Allergy intravenous contrast GFR le 30 mL/min/1.73 m2
